name: The Forge Arena

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Freezing Raccoon/The Forge Arena/TFA Launcher.exe

content:
files:
- forgearena: https://theforgearena.com/The%20Forge%20Arena.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Freezing Raccoon/The Forge Arena/TFA Launcher.exe
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: forgearena
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
